definition: portrait/to do a portrait of sb
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.chinese: 无遮盖的人体画像，有时具有讽喻意义。

sentences.english: The life-model for the painting of the figure of Jesus was hosen first.
sentences.chinese: 基督画像的真人模特是第一位被遴选。

sentences.english: This naughty boy the profile that picture choosing keeps from him Todd.
sentences.chinese: 这幅调皮男孩儿的画像选自托德自己写的小传。

sentences.english: Such personages, I think, would please nobody but the painter that made them.
sentences.chinese: 窃以为此等画像除画家本人外，恐无人喜爱也。

sentences.english: Experiments show that this method is effective in sketch-photo recognition.
sentences.chinese: 实验表明，该方法在画像识别中有较好的识别效果。

sentences.english: This paper is a comprehensive study of Heller's posthumous novel Portrait of an Artist, as an Old Man.
sentences.chinese: 本文是对海勒遗作《老年艺术家画像》的综合探讨。

sentences.english: Sometimes, he is shown standing next to a horse.
sentences.chinese: 有时，画像中的灶王爷是站在一匹马的旁边。

sentences.english: Mubarak poster hangs above the souq in Aswan.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克的画像悬挂在当地的集市上。

sentences.english: Her aunt now called her to look at a picture.
sentences.chinese: 她的舅母叫她去看一张画像。

sentences.english: Mr. Hunter collects early English miniatures.
sentences.chinese: 汉特先生收藏早期英国人物小画像。

sentences.english: Each has its personal likeness, its facial expression, as it were.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，每一个故事都有着个人独特的画像和表情。

sentences.english: Self-timer 10-second delay, for taking group photos or self-portraits.
sentences.chinese: 自拍10秒延迟采取组照片或自画像。

sentences.english: During one of the sittings, the wife made a rather unusual request.
sentences.chinese: 在画坐势画像时，妻子提出了一个非同寻常的要求。

sentences.english: The second chapter limits and the explanation self-portrait produce inevitability.
sentences.chinese: 第二章界定和解读“自画像”产生的必然性。

sentences.english: They are also all thinly veiled self-portraits.
sentences.chinese: 他们也都几乎没有遮掩的自画像。

sentences.english: The artist has reproduced your features very well in this portrait.
sentences.chinese: 这位艺术家在这幅画像中把你的容貌重现得维妙维肖。

definition: portrait (painting, photo etc)/(in a general sense) representation of a person/likeness
